Projects

New Step Consultation Services, 2021-Present

Payroll and employee management system with administrative tools.

N-Body Simulator

Project - Computational Astrophysics, 2024

Simulator for the n-body problem, studying how extremely minor changes in initial conditions propagate into massive changes.

Fetal Health Convolutional Model

Project - Biomedical Computing, 2024

A CNN trained to predict hypoxia from fetal heart rate waveforms processed into recurrence plots.

Vancouver Tour Routes

Project - Data Science, 2024

Point selection algorithm constructing tour routes with customization options, using OSM and Yelp datasets.

Panoramic Image Stitching

Project - Computer Vision, 2023

Image panoramic stitching program using FAST and RANSAC techniques.

Quo Vadis, Sharpness?

Study - Machine Learning, 2023

Analysis and further work on the behavior of progressive sharpness and edge of stability in gradient descent when training neural networks.

Quantum Bayesian Networks

Project - Quantum Computing, 2022

Implementation of Bayesian networks as quantum circuits for probabilistic modeling.

Face Intoxication Detection

Project - Computer Vision, 2022

Multimodal approach to intoxication detection by analyzing facial and audio data.

Skills

I'll take this opportunity to talk about my favorite languages:

> Python:
  • Incredibly easy to teach and with thousands of powerful libraries, it's the language I started programming with, on a Raspberry Pi. It's not the fastest or most efficient language, but its ubiquitous and accessible usage means you can do anything from drafting a simple script to data analysis while focusing on design and implementation.
> JAVA and C#:
  • Java is a great place to learn OOP fundamentals and develop code which is compatible across many platforms and services. For many applications, memory management is also less of a concern.

Although the languages above are my strengths, I've also used some other languages across different projects and courses.

In loose order of familiarity:

  • C and C++
  • SQL
  • MATLAB
  • Javascript
  • Go
  • Assembly
  • Lisp
  • Haskell
  • Lua
